title: Ministerial Functions) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 559 of 2020) and with the consent
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation). 

These Regulations provide for the payment of an annual amount in respect of 
remuneration to elected members of local authorities and the keeping of public 
registers in relation to payments of same in accordance with section 142 of the 
Local Government Act 2001. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [312] 7
